Class ProjectListController

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.Controller.ProjectListController
public class ProjectListController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling operations related to BTO project management.

This includes creating, editing, deleting, and viewing project details, primarily by HDB managers. It also supports fetching project details for officers.

  • Method Details

    • CreateNewProject

      public void CreateNewProject(HDBManagerView managerView, HDBManagerCreateProjectView createProjectView)
      Allows an HDB manager to create a new project if they are not already managing an active one.
      Parameters:
      managerView - the view used for general manager menu navigation
      createProjectView - the view used for prompting new project details

    • EditProject

      public void EditProject(HDBManagerView managerView, HDBManagerEditProjectView editProjectView)
      Allows an HDB manager to edit the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      managerView - the view used for general manager menu navigation
      editProjectView - the view used for prompting project name, attribute to edit, and new value

    • DeleteProject

      public void DeleteProject(HDBManagerView managerView, HDBManagerDeleteProjectView deleteProjectView)
      Allows an HDB manager to delete an existing project by name.
      Parameters:
      managerView - the manager view to return to the main menu and for displaying messages
      deleteProjectView - the view used for prompting the project name to delete

    • ViewProjects

      public void ViewProjects(HDBManagerView managerView, HDBManagerViewProjectsView viewProjectsView)
      Allows an HDB manager to view a list of projects with optional neighborhood filtering.
      Parameters:
      managerView - the view used for general manager menu navigation
      viewProjectsView - the view used for displaying and filtering project listings

    • getApprovedProjectName

      public String getApprovedProjectName(HDBOfficer officer)
      Retrieves the name of the project assigned to a specific HDB officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer whose approved project name is being retrieved
      Returns:
      the name of the project assigned to the officer, or null if none

    • getProjectDetails

      public Project getProjectDetails(String projectName)
      Retrieves the details of a project given its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      Returns:
      the Project object containing project details, or null if not found
